title: Club disappeared but my members say I am still the leader of it
body: My ign in game is Skyking Kenkai and the club name is xFamily and tag xF but only on my  end do I not see the club at all

replies.body: I have also had this issue since the first time it happened and when I sent in a support ticket I was told that it would be fixed eventually.

Your ticket was back in November, and the issue was fixed since then.  We'll want to work with SkyKing Kenkai individually to see why he's having this issue despite the fix.  Hope that clears things up!
Well the issue was not fixed for me but, ill send a ticket as well.

There shouldn't be any issues like this with clubs currently, so we'd like to take a closer look at your specific case.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can work with you individually and get this fixed.  We'll get back to you!
